subject: Triathlon
Transgender and Transsexual
New York City Triathlon
lead_paragraph: Chris Mosier, who will compete in the New York City Triathlon for the first time as a male, was picked on in high school and college for adopting an androgynous appearance.
snippet: Chris Mosier, who will compete in the New York City Triathlon for the first time as a male, was picked on in high school and college for adopting an androgynous appearance.
